narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Pyramid Healthcare is a Substance Abuse Rehabilitation Facility provider based in Belleville, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $87.3M in Medicaid payments across 322K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $87.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
